ProjectTitle: The regulation of ethylene production through the formation of MACC (malonyl-1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
07/06/2022
For more information about metadata collection and data sharing please take a look at the ELIXIR Research Data Management Kit: https://rdmkit.elixir-europe.org/plant_sciences. In addition to the repositories mentioned here you can also use RDR, the KU Leuven institutional data repository for data sharing and preservation, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
